Story Club with George Saunders

From Chautauqua

Well, it was pretty glorious, I have to say.

Hi everyone,

I’m writing this from the Buffalo airport, just having finished my visit to The Chautauaqua Institute, to do a talk and hear a workshop of the the opera of Lincoln in the Bardo, and have a few thoughts/inspirations to share, along with some photos.
